```{r}
librarian::shelf(tidyverse, dbplyr, lubridate, RPostgres, DBI, RIBBiTR-BII/ribbitrrr, ggplot2)

## Connect to DB
dbcon <- hopToDB("ribbitr")

sncon <- hopToDB("qpcr")
```

# data pointers
```{r}
db_bd = tbl(dbcon, Id("survey_data", "bd_qpcr_results"))

sn_res = tbl(sncon, Id("public", "results"))

sn_resi = tbl(sncon, Id("public", "results_snarl_import"))
```

# plotting
```{r}
data_bd = db_bd %>%
  collect()

data_sn = data_bd %>%
  filter(qpcr_lab == "snarl")

data_res = sn_res %>%
  collect()

unique(data_res$target)

data_resi = sn_resi %>%
  collect()

unique(data_resi$standard_type)

ggplot(data=data_bd, aes(x=log(average_target_quant), y=log(target_quant_per_swab), color=standard_target_type)) +
      geom_point()

ggplot(data=data_bd, aes(x=log(average_target_quant), y=log(target_quant_per_swab), color=standard)) +
      geom_point()

ggplot(data=data_bd, aes(x=log(average_target_quant), y=log(target_quant_per_swab), color=qpcr_lab)) +
      geom_point()

ggplot(data=data_sn, aes(x=log(average_target_quant), y=log(target_quant_per_swab), color=standard)) +
      geom_point()

ggplot(data=data_resi, aes(x=log(start_quant), y=log(bd_load), color=standard_type)) +
      geom_point()

some_calc = data_resi %>%
  mutate(factor = bd_load/ start_quant)

samp = data_res %>%
  filter(sample_id == "RKS18685")

```

# understand calculations
```{r}
# ct -> target_quant

ggplot(data = data_bd, aes(x=average_ct, y=log(average_target_quant), color = standard)) +
      geom_point()

# target_quant -> target_quant_per_swab

back_calc = data_bd %>%
  mutate(ratio = round(target_quant_per_swab / (average_target_quant * extract_volume_uL/(volume_template_dna_uL * qpcr_dilution_factor)), digits = 1)) %>%
  group_by(standard, ratio) %>%
  summarise(count = n())

peace = data_bd %>%
  filter(standard == "plasmid")

ggplot(data = data_bd, aes(x=log(average_target_quant * extract_volume_uL/(volume_template_dna_uL * qpcr_dilution_factor)), y=log(target_quant_per_swab), color = standard)) +
      geom_point()

ggplot(data = data_bd, aes(x=log(target_quant_per_swab), y=log(average_its1_copies_per_swab), color = standard)) +
      geom_point()

peace = data_bd %>%
  mutate(ratio = round(average_its1_copies_per_swab / target_quant_per_swab, digits = 0)) %>%
  group_by(ratio) %>%
  summarise(count = n())



```
